course_title: Introduction to Social and Political Philosophy
class_notes: Synchronous class attendance required. Timed, asynchronous assessments. Technology required: webcam, microphone.
course_description: This course is an introduction to the central concepts in social and political philosophy, such as liberty, equality, justice, and fairness
